description: Stores additional income types and values that correspond with entries from the ACCOUNT_FPL_INFO table.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. It is used to differentiate records in this table, but is not meaningful.

columns.name: ADDL_INCOME_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Additional income type for the federal poverty level (FPL) table.  This is a translated version of FPL Additional Income Type Combined (I EAR 144) storing the information as a discrete line instead of a delimited string.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADDL_INCOME_VALUE
columns.description: Additional income amount for the federal poverty level (FPL) table.  This is a translated version of FPL Additional Income Value Calculated (I EAR 145) storing the information as a discrete line instead of a delimited string.

columns.name: FPL_INFO_LINE
columns.description: Points to the line number ACCOUNT_FPL_INFO that this line is related to.
